sentence.Network_en: Nitrogen manuring is essential to get a good yield of cut herbage.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了获得刈割牧草良好的产量,使用氮肥是极为重要的.

sentence.Network_en: Fertilizers modify the composition of herbage.
sentence.Network_cn: 肥料可改变牧草的组成.

sentence.Network_en: The correlation was found between soil moisture and herbage coverage was significant.
sentence.Network_cn: 土壤湿度与草本植物盖度呈极显著正相关.
